# availableInputsChangeNotification | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ AVFAudio ](/documentation/avfaudio)

- [ AVAudioSession ](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession)

- [ availableInputsChangeNotification ](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession/availableinputschangenotification)

- [ AVAudioSession ](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession)

-  availableInputsChangeNotification 

Type Property# availableInputsChangeNotification

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+

```
class let availableInputsChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession/availableinputschangenotification#discussion)

Notification sent to registered listeners when there are changes in [`availableInputs`](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession/availableinputs).

There is no payload (userInfo dictionary) associated with the [`availableInputsChangeNotification`](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession/availableinputschangenotification) notification.

## [See Also](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession/availableinputschangenotification#see-also)

### [Configuring inputs](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession/availableinputschangenotification#Configuring-inputs)

[`var isInputAvailable: Bool`](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession/isinputavailable)A Boolean value that indicates whether an audio input path is available.[`var availableInputs: [AVAudioSessionPortDescription]?`](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession/availableinputs)An array of input ports available for audio routing.[`var preferredInput: AVAudioSessionPortDescription?`](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession/preferredinput)The preferred input port for audio routing.[`func setPreferredInput(AVAudioSessionPortDescription?) throws`](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession/setpreferredinput(_:))Sets the preferred input port for audio routing.[`var inputDataSource: AVAudioSessionDataSourceDescription?`](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession/inputdatasource)The currently selected input data source.[`var inputDataSources: [AVAudioSessionDataSourceDescription]?`](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession/inputdatasources)An array of available data sources for the audio session’s current input port.[`func setInputDataSource(AVAudioSessionDataSourceDescription?) throws`](/documentation/avfaudio/avaudiosession/setinputdatasource(_:))Selects a data source for the audio session’s current input port.
